title:
A Nonconforming Virtual Element Method for Advection-Diffusion-Reaction
  Problems with CIP Stabilization
authors: Carlo Lovadina, Ilaria Perugia, Manuel Trezzi
abstract:
We study a nonconforming virtual element method (VEM) for
advection-diffusion-reaction problems with continuous interior penalty (CIP)
stabilization. The design of the method is based on a standard variational
formulation of the problem (no skew-symmetrization), and boundary conditions
are imposed with a Nitsche technique. We use the enhanced version of VEM, with
a ``DoFi-DoFi'' stabilization in the diffusion and reaction terms. We prove
stability of the proposed method and derive $h$-version error estimates.
